topic: Applications of prompt shuffling in educational and professional settings
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that shuffling my own prompts can lead to unexpected insights and foster a more flexible mindset. The next step is to actively engage in this exercise by selecting a few prompts, shuffling them, and observing the new combinations that emerge. This experiment will help me assess its impact on creative thinking and identify any novel questions or ideas that arise from the process.

metadata.trigger: If I shuffled my own prompts, what new ones emerge?
